devdoc.details: the ownership will be transferred after deployment to the router contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processResponse(bytes32,uint256).details: function to process the oracle response (only callable from oracle)

params.requestId_: the id of the request to the Chainlink oracle

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRevenue(address).details: call to get the accumulated revenue      this method can be called only from a song contract

returns.requestId: the id of the request to the Chainlink oracle

whitelistContract(address).details: whitelist contracts in order to allow calling this contract (only router can whitelist after deploying the proxy, the router contract owns this one)

fundsManager().notice: the address of the FundsManager contract
